tweet: For those wondering, this was related a previous tweet where I said "I only own ones that I believe are positive for crypto-currency." Many thought this means that I didn't think Litecoin was positive.  P: "I own coin" Q: "Coin is positive"  If P, then Q ≠ not P, then not Q. 😀  https://t.co/200eGjmRxM

bech32 addresses are coming with the 0.16 release of Bitcoin and Litecoin. For more info on bech32, see this:  https://t.co/qCM0VAbPFr  These addresses will start with "bc1" ("ltc1" for Litecoin).  I bet in a few years, very few people will be using legacy "1"/"L" addresses.
